definition[0]: to put your name or initials on something, or to decorate it in your own way, to show that it belongs to you
example[0]: Why not do something to personalize your office?
definition[1]: to design or change something so that it is suitable for a particular person
example[1]: All the products can be personalized to the client’s exact requirements.
definition[2]: to discuss a subject by talking about or criticizing the people who are involved in it, rather than talking about it in a more general way
example[2]: the mass media’s tendency to personalize politics
